name: Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese Place
name_original: Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese Place
description: Spider-guy has been imprisoned by the dastardly Cheddar-Head within the cheese place. You take control of our protagonist spider-guy as he fights through hordes of the viscous cheese amalgamations that lie between you and the exit. This action packed platformer side scroller is vibrant with depictions of cheesy horror. Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese place is a single player game that uses left, right, and jump to control the character.
